title: Design of Physical Education Game Classes Through the Application of Teaching Games for Understanding (TGfU) (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Physical Education Theory and Understanding of Basketball Rules
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design competencies for designing game-based learning activities in online environments

learning_goals: Design physical education game lessons by applying the six stages of the TGfU model (game, game form, tactical problem, tactical solution, decision-making, outcome)
Propose three or more game modification strategies to enhance learner engagement
Develop practical game lesson designs through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
